item.title: QakbotMSI
item.description: Executive Summary # In mid-April 2022, Mandiant observed UNC2500 campaigns using MSI packages to distribute Qakbot payloads. This change comes shortly after Microsoftâ€™s announcement that macros from Office documents downloaded from the internet (ZoneIdentifier ADS) will be blocked by default. This new payload uses a botnet ID AA, which is unique from previous campaigns that have used tr, cullinan, and cullinan01. Distribution came from phishing emails containing a malicious link from either OneDrive or files hosted on compromised websites that downloads a ZIP archive.
